Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Harper
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North/Halsted
ShortDescription: 72 North buses are rerouted: North Ave, Halsted, Armitage, Racine, Clybourn, Cortland, Elston, & North Ave due to street blockage at North/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Avenue, Halsted, Armitage, Racine, Clybourn, Cortland, Elston, and North Avenue, due to street blockage at North/Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.
